title: Poster, 1970
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
markings: Verso: adhesive label at lower left corner: Name of entrant / M.I.T. / Office of Publications / Address: 77 Massachusetts Avenue / Cmabridge / Massachusetts 02139 / Room 5-133 / Designer/Art Director: / Dietmar R. Winkler / Client / Massachusetts Institute of Technology / Year Produced / Return Desired / No
signed: Imprinted on adhesive label verso lower left corner: Dietmar P. Winkler
inscribed:
Inprinted in black lower centerleft column: Karl Taylor / Compton Seminar /Series /Massachusetts / Institute of Technology / Kresge Auditorium / Wednesday, / February 25, 1970 / 8 pm / Free Tickets available / Monday, / Februsary 23, 1970 / 10 am / Lobby Building 10.
Second column: Moderator: / Dr. James R. Killian / Chairman of the MIT Corporation / Panelists: / Fred W. Friendly / Former Vice President, / CBS News / Mike Wallace / Correspondent, / CBS News / Edwin Diamond / Former Senior Editor, / Newsweek / Thomas Winship / Editor / Boston Globe
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: The title, Mass Communication of Complicated Issues, is repeated in overlapping black and red block text against a white background. At lower center two columns of text give information on the seminar and participants.
